SELECT a.article_id as articleId, a.user_id as userId, a.title, a.subTitle, a.description, a.article, a.static_link as staticLink, a.is_top as isTop, a.is_delete as isDelete, a.is_comment as isComment, a.status, a.push, a.comments, a.hits, a.collections, a.loves, a.tag, a.width, a.height, a.article_channel_id as channelId, a.article_category_id as categoryId, a.image, a.thumnail, a.create_time as createTime, u.name, u.header_pic as headerPic
FROM article a LEFT JOIN user u ON u.user_id = a.user_id
and a.channel_id = #{channelId}
and a.title LIKE '%${keyword}%'
and a.is_delete = #{isDelete}
AND TO_DAYS(a.create_time) = to_days(now())
AND AND TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(a.create_time)=1
AND AND DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 DAY) <= date(a.create_time)
AND WEEKOFYEAR(a.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
AND YEARWEEK(date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())-1
AND date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m')
AND date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m')
AND QUARTER(a.create_time)=QUARTER(DATE_SUB(now(),interval 1 QUARTER))
AND QUARTER(a.create_time)=QUARTER(now())
ORDER BY a.${order} LIMIT #{pageNo} ,#{pageSize};

SELECT article_id as articleId, user_id as userId, title, subTitle, description, article, static_link as staticLink, is_top as isTop, is_delete as isDelete, is_comment as isComment, status, push, comments, hits, collections, loves, tag, width, height, article_channel_id as channelId, article_category_id as categoryId, image, thumnail, create_time as createTime FROM article WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.delete: update article set is_delete = 1 where article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article( article_id, user_id, title, subTitle, description, article, static_link, is_top, is_delete, is_comment, status, push, comments, hits, collections, loves, tag, width, height, article_channel_id, article_category_id, type, image, thumnail, create_time, keyword ) VALUES ( #{articleId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{subTitle}, #{description}, #{article}, #{staticLink}, #{isTop}, #{isDelete}, #{isComment}, #{status}, #{push}, #{comments}, #{hits}, #{collections}, #{loves}, #{tag}, #{width}, #{height}, #{channelId}, #{categoryId}, #{type}, #{image}, #{thumnail}, #{createTime}, #{keyword} )
